document.full_text: a powerful tornado scored a direct hit on the southwest missouri town of joplin on sunday, killing at least 125 people and leaving at least 823 more injured, authorities said on wednesday.
document.title: factbox: ten deadliest tornadoes in u.s. history
lines_and_colors: a powerful tornado scored a direct hit on the southwest missouri town of joplin on sunday, killing at least 125 people and leaving at least 823 more injured, authorities said on wednesday.
